name: The Serpent Coast Map
description:
The Serpent Coast hexcrawl sandbox by Horos is a high-resolution ready-to-print 420x297mm 6-mile per hex color map. It features dozens of points of interest, evocative toponyms, trails, sailing routes, and different landforms for you to use with your party as a DM or during your solo RPG sessions.

The hexes are 4-digit numbered to ease the exploration and the PDF's selectable text is sharp enough to help the visualization. A high-resolution JPG is also provided.

Inspired by old-school campaign settings like Allansia, Blackmoor, Greyhawk, and Forgotten Realms, the lands of Rhuran, Horkia, Skandia, and Nimir are waiting for you to be explored. Delve into deadly monster lairs, journey to cursed places, and unearth ancient treasures. This sandbox map will help you create open-ended stories, expanded and detailed as you adventure even further. The Serpent Coast hexcrawl map is the perfect tool for your next West Marches campaign.

You can use it with your favorite fantasy TTRPG like Dungeons & Dragons (B/X, BECMI, Rules Cyclopedia), Advanced Dungeons & Dragons, D&D 5E, Old-School Essentials, Dungeon Crawl Classics, Maze Rats, Knave, Labyrinth Lord, White Box, Swords & Wizardry, Fighting Fantasy, Advanced Fighting Fantasy or any other ruleset of your choice.
